org.apache.giraph.worker

类 InputSplitsCallable<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.worker.InputSplitsCallable<I,V,E,M>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex index value
    V - Vertex value
    E - Edge value
    M - Message data
    所有已实现的接口:
    Callable<VertexEdgeCount>
    直接已知子类:
    EdgeInputSplitsCallable, VertexInputSplitsCallable

    public abstract class InputSplitsCallable<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements Callable<VertexEdgeCount>
    Abstract base class for loading vertex/edge input splits. Every thread will has its own instance of WorkerClientRequestProcessor to send requests.
